lead_paragraph: DUBOFSKY--Robert. P and F Industries and its employees extend our deepest condolences on the passing of our friend and esteemed Board member of over 23 years. Our heartfelt sympathy goes to his wife Betsy and his children Ned and Nancy and their extended families.
